subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Spain, led by counterattack goals by David Villa and Andrés Iniesta, defeated Chile to win its group, and avoided facing Brazil, the other co-favorite, in the Round of 16.
snippet: Spain, led by counterattack goals by David Villa and Andrés Iniesta, defeated Chile to win its group, and avoided facing Brazil, the other co-favorite, in the Round of 16.
